column1: Cusano Milanino (local Lombard: Cusan [kyˈzãː]) is a town and comune in the Metropolitan City of Milan
column2: in Lombardy. Cusano Milanino is about 13 kilometers far from the center of Milan.

column1: The 18th-century Italian economist and antiquarian Count Carli died in the town
column2: then part of the Duchy of Milan

column1: Cusano is also the birthplace of former soccer player and coach Giovanni Trapattoni
